name: The book of commands : Lost Symbol
description: 2D Action RPG Game from Limpage. "The book of commands : Lost symbol" The player can level up, change class, change equipment, upgrade, craft item, setting skills. Do anything to finding a way to survive from the large dungeon and strong enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: vista / windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9c capable graphics card, Shader Model 1.1 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 450 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: vista / windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9c capable graphics card, Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
